title: Business and Marketing Technology: Marketing Business Enterprise
subject: CTE (2020-)

3285A98E639D4FF59B1F5084D63C9085.description:
Discuss how to manage social media
presence for the business: allowing and
responding to comments, managing the
business’ reputation, copycat accounts,
twitter handles, geo filters, consistency,
employee training on your company social
media policies, etc.

384FB3FE14934AB985B9E90D8F0380C7.description:
Identify different website platforms to
host e-commerce.

69F83B538C9A4553B32ED544FF4C317C.description: Explain and analyze the benefits and challenges of electronic commerce.

CEF82D37E83B4E3097B82925D57C874F.description:
Identify & compare computer
software needed to run a business.

0FBA50D4667749FC89FA585B0DF523DD.description: Explain hardware and software used for daily business operations.

F2E68748111847BDB412E07F3B33F565.description:
Examine the relationship between
risk & return when investing.

89BFD16EDDE544469E0923879FCCE83F.description:
Understand and compute simple vs
compound interest.

E01E9E91F5E8495793FA2C31C3CF1F08.description: Explain the importance of saving and discuss strategies for saving and investing wisely.

994DA1DC72F34903BB65503805B80D26.description:
Explain how to determine the best
growth strategy for your business and
market.

E8B41DB0A2A94BB2B2E07E2B500FE1D1.description: Research, identify, and discuss business growth strategies.

F6116901A20D48D89AB77E52EFC2192F.description:
Determine different strategies to
insure against risk.

BD308F9FB7154E849529852059B2A253.description:
Discuss types of business risks:
strategic, financial, compliance,
operational, reputational, natural disasters
(“acts of God”), theft, political, economic,
etc.

79EDED49FC574F7D96B0D0D652B7B66E.description:
Understand and explain the importance of risk management decisions and how risk management is critical to the
success of a business.

5902D527E3464CF1AD9D5CF9F029E7F4.description:
Discuss and construct pro forma
income statement & balance sheet.

0D10C60AD6BE438F9551CDF1C4F59E6D.description:
Explain methods for managing Cash
Flow Statements.

72744699E1E8445EBE77C137306B7363.description:
Discuss and explain the advantages
of a point of sale system.

C9864228F1C9416CAB26B43C028B78E0.description:
Compare advantages/disadvantages
of manual vs computerized accounting
systems.

BFFFEE81937C4C058FB9C618FDB17E0A.description: Understand the importance of accurate and reliable inventory management processes and procedures.

38FA3D11320A46D69411B9E61E6C9F16.description:
Discuss types of business records
prepared by businesses.

4A689E5993CC4CD4A144692FDCACBC90.description:
Locate sources of loans and other
small business assistance.

326115DC32C2451D91304E95E978DE3C.description:
Identify and assess entrepreneurial
startup costs

1E686A22A61248659150174314B906C2.description:
Understand and prepare financial
documents related to business ownership:
income statement, balance sheet, cash
flow statements, estimated quarterly taxes,
Form W7 (EIN numbers), Form W-9, Form
1099-MISC, etc.

E212EF4D33404629B6AD000EDE3F0A3F.description: Understand, explain, and demonstrate procedures for financing a business start-up and continuing business operations.

422B200B70B54E7CA159B1EAB956008C.description: Understand and explain effective employee motivation and training techniques.

00D279044FB24906AD6B6626AB8571FF.description:
Understand and explain local, state
and federal payroll taxes.

C66BFDBB03C3487290F18ACBB11FF279.description:
Understand and prepare documents
required when hiring individuals: create
application forms, Form I9, Form 1099,
Form W4, W2, Form SS-4, etc.

744C9D0C2CFF42D396831BA57D1FC615.description:
Analyze work related compensation
plans & employee regulations. (Local,
State, & Federal)

65055E4BB4C54BDAAB78D8EE17D1F118.description:
Define and develop recruiting &
hiring procedures.

E91CBEB6A31C4698ACC86E49EBFE91DE.description:
Understand and discuss issues and concepts related to staffing and managing the human resources of an
organization.

E9970B352FDC4C80B13A3C56C2E9EC45.description:
Practice and demonstrate
presenting/pitching a business plan to
potential investors.

4065F90C5E3846A7BDCFDD6990317BDB.description:
Learn the importance of an effective
pitch.

7704DDE974BF4D5B8C7CFC28366CE163.description:
Compare and contrast a traditional
business plan to the lean canvas.

1784B81671154AE1928F68B5A98C18CD.description:
Examine and design parts of a
business plan.

68DE7161E5AD4B59A3AB9A3B54B1E2DD.description: Understand the purpose for and develop a business plan.

36F914A6F48940DDA5EDAEB0B886B1B2.description:
Discuss types of businesses that
require special licensing or permits:
hospitality, child care, health care, homebased businesses, restaurant and food
service, etc.

0FB2C08C3FAD47F49203833BE60BF66F.description:
Identify and differentiate between the
types of business ownership.

D76590796A7843709B67503CB75CE1E5.description:
Understand and explain the different types of business ownership and regulations that affect business ownership
decisions.

EF7117A1C9A8481F8FC9D55A428DA321.description:
Identify, analyze, and assess the
branding strategies of a variety of
products/services.

72D8B8D10E86449E891460A308E394B2.description: Position products to acquire a desired image.

B349AB6034634D879237DF3928AD0E3D.description:
Design and plan promotional
strategies while applying the marketing
concept.

F08015B6E0544DC5AA7ACB00B5826D20.description:
Evaluate different channels of
distribution and discuss how each meets
customer wants or needs.

CF4B43F732E04FD58EE09BBE98AF7B7D.description:
Calculate mark-up, mark-down, sales
tax, discounts.

4C1856CDCF2B402C8FF96BF51439A87B.description:
Evaluate different pricing methods
with the marketing concept in mind.

2B88C24F137A4B2D866967150CFA0A56.description:
Define elements of product mix & life
cycle and how it affects business.

2E800CF833044471A4EF83E3F5BB38D0.description:
Discuss how to establish marketing
goals utilizing the 5 Ps based on the
marketing concept.

4A1F3176981547EAA591B637C7830BCB.description: Understand the relationship between the marketing mix and the marketing concept.

3ED98904C5BB4B668F070B83F373FD0C.description:
Discuss and explain zoning
regulations and how they affect small
business operations.

5E8EF50AA6274EEE8CE5AF58FC3AEA4E.description:
Discuss the importance of location to
the success of a business.

9A5BA74271D84D9CB73DE73FD17CF2E4.description:
Assess equipment, supplies and
inventory planning needs.

A832267B1A6B448A83A67383ABC51AED.description:
Generate strategies for effective
business design and layout.

981853D3E23D486580B8C57CE115722C.description: Understand the impact that business design, layout, location, and planning have on the success of a business venture.

BC104710995749B0AAD5672A7F52453B.description:
Understand and explain the
importance of researching competitors in
your market

763385F44794464DAD5E229128B3CE87.description: Understand the competitive nature of business and how competition affects entrepreneurial decisions.

CEA8F1ED00E047B4B82893ADF3BD8584.description:
Compare and contrast the 5 Ps
Model with the new SAVE Marketing.
Identify some current businesses
implementing the SAVE marketing model.

9DA6D61FCA614AE08F42E41767D4B944.description:
Explain the modified marketing mix
(7 Ps) model for service organizations: product, price, place, promotion, people,
process, and physical evidence.

796993974480400EB6015F25FC709C65.description:
Discuss the fifth P of the marketing
mix: people, and why this is such an
important element.

19135F2BD99040BBA3A569AEE9C6D498.description:
Discuss the five elements of the
marketing mix (product, price,
place/distribution, promotion, and people).

616D40B07D2A4E5AB9AD9CD886E891C0.description: Understand and explain the marketing mix models.

0D52485F14BB4A2FB212C2186D4D9540.description:
Conduct market research utilizing a
variety of strategies and resources.

1250E3F9E64043BBA16404B0259158A3.description:
Define and explain market
segmentation and discuss how
segmentation affects marketing strategies.

C59D05B4A87C416A9CD1B75A94C22059.description:
Identify target markets based on a
variety of demographic and psychographic
factors.

B0E2E234C84140A695B4E7E22B7BBE87.description:
Examine how consumer motivations
and behaviors influence marketing
decisions.

1DEA984C8EE041E7B5AAE1E6C4FAE7E4.description:
Students will identify key business
stakeholders and explain their role in the
success of an organization.

3AEE8BD7EFC540CF88D70C887C556C3D.description: Understand the importance of market research and methods for determining a target market, and market segmentation.

A6080CC74E6C471E86CD20AD02505FED.description:
Apply financial principles related to
entrepreneurship: bottom line, gross
margin, fixed versus variable costs, equity
to debt ratio, leverage, capital, assets,
expenses, cash flow, interest, inflation, etc.

4210B81240D64A019F5C52B4F35C2A1B.description:
Explain the effects of market cost
and pricing.

182D0BD731384C839EABAC63FF32EB87.description:
Identify the economic utilities of form,
place, time, and possession and discuss
how they bring value to products and
services offered

B0BDE83765EC4AA1A029D0548BB3132E.description:
Distinguish between wants and
needs and discuss why it is important for
entrepreneurs to accurately assess wants
and needs for the success of their
business.

6CC401C292E1490A8F8C77C133A68504.description:
Understand and explain the
marketing concept and its importance to
business success.

23DDD46830C74E66A9842D43A6740594.description: Explore and discuss economic and financial factors that affect entrepreneurial success.

EE397E09804F418CA48CE68B23B97301.description:
Explain the purpose of a code of
ethics. Research and evaluate various
codes of ethics for a variety of businesses
and industries.

9D78D51C9458440C8345A2EC233F4C76.description:
Discuss the difference between legal
and ethical decisions.

2C7B65A524EB4206AB9FAF51C609A027.description:
Provide examples of ethical behavior
and contrast with examples of unethical
behavior. Evaluate real-world scenarios
and discuss the ethical considerations
involved in those situations.

87ABDD7D370D4AD3972F6D941FEED821.description: Explain ethics as it applies to business decisions and operations.

851C4F3139EA4242954E72271C51FBA7.description:
Research and explain personal
development plans and their importance to
career development for entrepreneurs.
Develop a personal development plan.

0F42899366CD4D5997A65F8A5145D86F.description:
Develop and demonstrate
professional written, verbal, and nonverbal
skills in a variety of career related
situations. (Sales pitch, job interview,
informational, conference call, video
conference session, etc.)

7622D4B75A9F485FB775C63C571E08F7.description: Develop work ethic skills related to marketing and entrepreneurship such as enthusiasm, self-motivation, honesty, integrity, persistence and tenacity, dependability and reliability, accountability, attendance, willingness to stay busy, willingness to forego leisure activities to meet professional goals, patience, resilience, etc.

08EBA1A1563A4727A265571F60991DB7.description:
Explain what it means to “do the right
thing” and how it affects the profitability of
the employer, and ultimately one’s job
security and income.

D97E2736BE2D41D88BCE0933F37EC7C8.description:
Understand the need to use social
media ethically and responsibly as an
employee.

D38CA243AFB24F608235D093F6A41E73.description:
Discuss ethical issues and the
importance of protecting client information
and privacy.

050C0A36009C4FD6AC5E426F1DA1899F.description:
Explain the importance of protecting
company information.

ED6C12CCBE07432AA33D485A275446F0.description: Demonstrate understanding of ethics, privacy, and security of information.

2F8AE8B858184545815342FA9893AC56.description:
Discuss the importance of
documenting interactions with customers,
clients, and co-workers, and how a
customer relationship management system
can assist with managing customer
relationships.

3D39DBEBECC247F89FCE57F865E04FCE.description:
Understand and explain the
importance of customer relationship
management and discuss various ways
that companies seek to manage customer
relationships.

78B0A4BAFF60482EBC6ED24B3C05C65E.description:
Participate in activities that help to
develop teamwork and cooperation

A7942A0B482E43AC8B8F5F3BB5970B87.description: Develop and apply interpersonal skills required to be an effective employee and that are crucial for career success.

5013AD60F8594B1BBB6B92EAAAC8273E.description:
Understand the importance of
personal branding and develop a plan for
managing one’s personal brand.

FE0CF1D0E10A4F6FBE45BCC73FBEC1DE.description: Develop personal skills related to career success.
